title: SolarWinds Hackers Continue to Hit Technology Companies, Says Microsoft
sub_head: Russia-linked group has stepped up attacks, cybersecurity experts say
body: The Russia-linked hackers behind last yearâ€™s compromise of a wide swath of the U.S. government and scores of private companies, including SolarWinds Corp. , have stepped up their attacks in recent months, breaking into technology companies in an effort to steal sensitive information, cybersecurity experts said.
